sentences.en: A regressive tax, like the poll tax, takes proportionately more of a poor person's income.
sentences.cn: 像人头税一样, 递减税占穷人收入的比例更大.

sentences.en: Apparently, ordinary people's salary has not increased proportionately with the rising prices.
sentences.cn: 显然, 一般人的薪水并未与不断抬升的物价同步增加.

sentences.en: As the roast darkens, caffeine and acidity decrease proportionately.
sentences.cn: 烘焙度越深, 咖啡因含量越少,酸度也越小.

sentences.en: Costs have risen, and prices will rise proportionately.
sentences.cn: 成本增加了, 价格也要相应提高.

sentences.en: Enlarge or reduce the full signature proportionately.
sentences.cn: 放大或缩小比例的完整的签名.

sentences.en: More will go to services and proportionately less to hardware.
sentences.cn: 更多支出将用于服务,硬件则成比例减少.

sentences.en: Proportionately, eastern European NATO members have helped most in Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 相应地, 东欧北约成员国对阿富汗的帮助最大.

sentences.en: The amount of sugar in tears changes proportionately with the blood authors explain.
sentences.cn: 科学家表示:“泪水中的含糖比率,和血液中的含糖比率成正比例改变. ”

sentences.en: The Irish educate proportionately more young people to university level than the British.
sentences.cn: 按比例算，爱尔兰接受大学教育的年轻人比英国要多。

sentences.en: These extremely high frequencies allow proportionately wider band - width signals to be transmitted.
sentences.cn: 这些超高频能传送均衡的宽频信号.

sentences.en: This error will be proportionately reduced for smaller temperature differences.
sentences.cn: 这个错误将减少比例较小的温差.

sentences.en: This move was unexpected, and proportionately disconcerting.
sentences.cn: 这一招倒是出人意料, 而且也使人难以招架.
通过分派或分发的分配行为.

sentences.en: We have significantly increased the number of people in education but the size of the classes hasn't changed proportionately.
sentences.cn: 受教育的人数显著增加了，可是班级人数并未相应增加。

sentences.en: Your salary will rise proportionately to your workload.
sentences.cn: 你的工资会根据你的工作量成正比增长.
